content: this pattern can be found for free online at https //www jessieathome com/pattern/fall-cowgirl/ 1 https //www jessieathome com/pattern/fall-cowgirl/ 1 fall cowgirl is a cowl with a small shawl attached it is a crochet version of my popular spring cowgirl knit pattern this fun little neck warmer can be worn as an accessory to your fall outfits and is made to neatly tuck into most coats the size of the bottom portion is large enough to keep you warm and tuck into even a v~neck coat but not so large as to be uncomfortable when it is tucked in of course you can also wear it on top of your coat to show off your lovely crochet skills size 18 around cowl section 6 5 tall at center back height of cowl section 19 tall at center front height of cowl and longest point of bandana section yarn crystal palace mini mochi 2 skeins used in sample is now discontinued *~*good yarn sub*~* knitpicks stroll hand painted 75% fine superwash merino wool 25% nylon size 1 fingering weight 462 yds / 100 g yds/g = 4 62 1 skein hook 3 75 mm us 5/f gauge 14 sts x 24 row = 4 10 cm in linen stitch single_crochet chain 1 counts as 1 st other supplies yarn needle stitches and abbreviations chain - chain single_crochet - single_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch space s - space s st s - stitch es treble_crochet - treble_crochet 1 https //www jessieathome com/pattern/fall-cowgirl/ https //www jessieathome com/pattern/fall-cowgirl/
